title: Dissecting the Apple M1 GPU, the end
author: alsetmusic
aiHeadline: The Apple M1 GPU's secrets are finally out, and it turns out it's just been hiding its lack of power all along.

title: Monodraw

title: Nx compromised: malware uses Claude code CLI to explore the filesystem
author: neuroo

title: The Therac-25 Incident (2021)
author: lemper
aiHeadline: The Therac-25 Incident: when radiation therapy goes wrong, and software bugs become the stuff of nightmares. A cautionary tale for all us tech enthusiasts.
